long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Anime Wallpaper for each new tab you open. 
You can also search from this new tab page anything you want through the search field.
A very simple, light and refreshing new tab wallpapers.

By clicking "Add To Chrome", you accept and agree to install the Tabanima Extension and set Chrome New Tab search provider to the one provided by the service.
The search features within the extension will be provided by Microsoft Bing.

Please note:
Tabanima will change your Chrome New Tab backgrounds and set Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing.

Backgrounds for Tabanima Extension were taken from https://www.animenbo.com/2021/01/free-anime-images-for-commercial-use.html
